Articles.Content: So a few months ago (Almost a year now), I created "The First Great War", which was a war novel similar to the "Second Great War" (I know; I'm original). I accidentally let it die, but now I'm thinking about re-releasing it. Please let me know what you guys want; I would love it
I clicked no, but i dont care. Its up to you. If you enjoyed writing it, continue, if you did not enjoy writing it and took up some of your freetime, dont.

2 hours ago, NSEP said:

I clicked no, but i dont care. Its up to you. If you enjoyed writing it, continue, if you did not enjoy writing it and took up some of your freetime, dont.

Well basically the only thing that'll take up a bit of time would be copy & pasting it. I typed it up on a Pages doc, and so since it's already done, I won't really need to do much except maybe some editing (Fixing grammar, spelling, etc.) and then just pasting the chapter to the forums
